JKSLF (JAMMU AND KASHMIR STUDENTS LIBERATION FRONT)
JKLF was founded by Amanullah Khan in Birmingham in June 1976 from the erstwhile UK chapter of the 'Plebiscite Front'.
People arriving at the venue for JKLF's 'Tahafuz e Jammu Kashmir Conference'.
جموں کشمیر لبریشن فرنٹ کے زیر اہتمام تحفظ جموں کشمیر کانفرنس کچھ دیر میں شروع ہونے والی ہے۔
پنجیڑہ، جموں کشمیر جموں کشمیر سٹوڈنٹس لبریشن فرنٹ (JKSLF) پنجیڑہ کالج کی تشکیل نو۔ راجہ بشیر صدر منتخب۔ تمام نومنتخب عہدیداران کو مبارکباد۔
Yusuf Shah called himself "Syed Salahuddin" and became a guerrilla fighter, eventually becoming the commander-in-chief of the Hizb-ul-Mujahideen.
Yasin Malik, along with Hamid Sheikh, Ashfaq Wani and Javed Ahmad Mir, formed the core group — dubbed the "HAJY" group
ULFA was founded on 7 April 1979 in Sivasagar
ULFAset up camps in Tinsukia and Dibrugarh
ULFA maintained close relationships with other separatist organisations like NDFB, KLO and NSCN (Khaplang).
major assassinations by ULFA include that of Surendra Paul in May 1990
